step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your wrists a bit closer together in the future.
You're doing well raising your hands. Focus on keeping your elbows closer to your head as you move them up.
Excellent work spreading your elbows wide behind your head. This is a key part of the stretch.
Holding the stretch is great. Ensure your elbows stay wide and you maintain an upright posture.
You're returning to the start position. Try to keep your wrists and elbows more aligned as you bring your hands forward.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close to your head when raising your hands and spread them wide behind your head. This helps improve shoulder flexibility.
